Comment: Much as I despise the current Administration, this is actually normal. The level and amount of damages didn’t meet the criteria required to declare those specific counties, whether it be for individual or public assistance.  It is based on the severity of, and how widespread, the damages are.   The President only signs or doesn’t sign the declaration of disaster for the entire state, FEMA  itself decides which counties are eligible for either of those types of assistance.  That said, by running his stupid mouth all the time, I find it hilarious that he gets the blame for this. He clearly doesn’t understand how any government agencies actually work.
